<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Savior Spike](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2991)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=610" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 267 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt to Grab an Edge but haven't rolled

 
</row>

</column>

---

This pyramid-shaped spike is attached to an armor's chest piece. When you activate the spike, it shoots a strand of force to help you gain purchase, giving you a +1 item bonus to the check. If you roll a success on the triggering attempt, you get a critical success instead. If you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Savior Spike
